data.name: Decimal string to binary string
data.description:
## Problem
Given a string representing a positive integer in decimal (e.g. `"485"`), convert it into a string representing a number in binary (e.g. `"111100101"`).

## Limitations

Any language-specific limitations will be shown below:

~~~if:javascript,typescript
- `BigInt` is not available.
- `eval` is not available.
~~~


## Examples
```javascript,typescript
decToBin("0") // "0"
decToBin("29") // "11101"
decToBin("9007199254740991") // "11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111"
decToBin("39102652987361082736") // "100001111010101000100001111011011110011111000001100011110101110000"
```

## Hint(s)

Any language-specific hints will be shown below:

~~~if:javascript,typescript

- Essentially, you'll need to replicate the function `(d) => BigInt(d).toString(2)`
~~~
